name: eDNA Metabarcoding Framework
desc: An advanced AI-driven framework for precision taxonomy and global biodiversity assessment using environmental DNA (eDNA) metabarcoding, integrating complex genetic data processing.

name: Luxe Market - Online Grocery Store
desc: A modern online grocery shopping platform with a user-friendly interface for seamless product browsing and management.

name: College ERP Student Management System
desc: A comprehensive ERP system for colleges to manage student data, attendance, and academic performance efficiently.

name: Library Management System
desc: A digital platform to manage library resources, including book tracking, member records, and loan management.

name: Lung Cancer Prediction System
desc: A Machine Learning powered system for the early detection and prediction of lung cancer using diagnostic data.

name: Rural School Attendance Control
desc: A localized student management and attendance tracking system designed for schools in rural areas.

name: Real-time Phishing Detection System
desc: A cybersecurity framework that identifies and alerts users about phishing threats in real-time.

name: Authenticity Validator for Academia
desc: Ensuring the integrity of academic submissions through an automated authenticity verification system.

name: AI-Based Internship Recommendation Engine
desc: Personalized internship suggestions for students under the PM Internship Scheme using AI algorithms.

name: Blockchain Based Voting System
desc: A secure and transparent voting platform leveraging blockchain technology for tamper-proof results.

name: Speech Emotion Recognization
desc: An AI system that detects human emotions from voice samples using speech pattern analysis.

name: Fake News Detector
desc: Identifying misinformation and fake news using natural language processing and truth verification models.
